name: Ride the Sauze
description:
Enjoy the ride on the mountain, but what will you do when the snow start to lack ? Rate the compo entry right here https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/ride-the-sauze ! In this game based on a true story, ride, carve, jump you way down the mountain, but be careful when you reach the bottom !

Ride the Sauze is a procedural snowboarding game made with Unity, allowing you to experience a brand new mountain each time you play. But in the end, no matter how good your ride is, the snow will be gone.

You can play the game with a controller, but I recommend using your keyboard (arrow keys + space or Q/D + key up) since it is what the gameplay was tuned for.

Enjoy your ride and thanks for playing my game !
